name: myNEBFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Looking for the best way to perform a ligation? Wondering how to get more transformants? myNEB provides technical tips and tricks to help you with your cloning experiments , based on our scientists’ decades of experience! The content focuses mainly on the cloning workflow, including ligation, amplification, transformation and DNA assembly. Didn’t find the answer you were looking for? Do you have a suggestion to make myNEB even better? Submit your ideas to us at http://www.neb.com/myNEB.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
